name: Hilda
info:
A cheerful, passionate, and friendly girl who is carefree and not meticulous.
She doesn't care about gender, age, or social standing, and treats everyone the same. Even Theo, the son of Banges Tech's owner, is a good friend.
But she is also careless and forgetful, sometimes even leaving her weapon at home...
description:
Hilda is the "star" of Banges Port, where everyone knows her name.
Banges is her home, and she feels that she must protect it.
She doesn't have a steady job, and just works part-time at the shops by the port, occasionally dabbling in patrolling and security. When she's tired, she takes time off to shop and enjoy good food.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to 40 rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to 11.4% of ATK + 1. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

skills.name: Turret
skills.description: Enable turret mode and fire large energy orbs, each dealing damage equal to 213.3% of ATK + 11 and launching the target into the air. Become immune to hitstun and control effects while setting up the turret. Cooldown: 3.5 seconds.

skills.name: Arctic Beam
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, remove all debuffs from the wielder and fire an arctic beam upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to 329.2% of ATK + 17 and inflict a 3-second freeze effect. Also reduce the target's frost resistance by 50% for 10 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Ice Shell
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will freeze targets for 2 seconds and leave them frostbitten for 6 seconds. Breaking the ice shell causes additional damage equal to 111% of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by 50%.

advancement: Every successful normal attack increases damage by 1% for 2 seconds. Stack up to 15 times. Increase ammo count to 60.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 10%.
Within 10 seconds of switching to the weapon, increase damage of normal attacks and shatter by 30%. Cooldown: 25 seconds. Increase ammo to 80.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 20%.
Reduce cooldown of normal attacks while in turret mode by 2 seconds.
Within 10 seconds upon switching to the weapon, increase damage of normal attacks and shatter by 60%. Cooldown: 25 seconds.

traits.name: Pedal to the Metal
traits.description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by 7%.

traits.name: Full-speed Drifting
traits.description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by 10%.
